item.title: Lessons learnt from Steve Jobs
item.description: Reflecting on Steve Job’s biography, these are some of my takeaway lessons. I learnt more about great products, entrepreneurship and how organizations can strive.

item.title: Why I go to hackathons and why you should consider going.
item.description: For those who haven't been in a hackathon yet, you should. You will have fun, learn new stuff, expand your network by meeting new interesting people.
item.dc:creator: Ahmed Mansour
